content: if you own a pair airpods you are fully aware that they come in a hard case if you ve ever dropped this case then you know this can cause them to go flying this hand knit cozy will help prevent that from happening using a small amount of fingering weight yarn this airpod cozy is quick and easy to knit out of those leftover bits of fingering weight yarn in your stash they can be easily customized with contrasting cuffs or stripes as desired knit them out of a bright fun color and they will be easy to find in the bottom of your bag pattern includes three options for closing the bottom simply choose the one that suits you best pattern is written for one size differences in gauge will affect overall size and yardage required
